Dunbar's number: Why we can only maintain 150 relationships

stories.text:
Hey ! We're a young team building a tool to turn OKRs into daily tasks so you can finally make sure your big projects become reality.

How do you make sure you progress on big goals on a daily basis? Would love to hear your recos.

The approach we're taking is that projects happen across tons of app so we're building the tool that can spot any task you have across tools, and centralise it all on Kairn to help you prioritise and get things done.

Wanna test it? Just ping me :)
stories.title: How to make OKRs into daily tasks?
